items.sentence: Do you have a name picked out for your baby?
Tom made Mary an offer she couldn\'t refuse.
Tom warned Mary to stay away from his house.
Tom was a wealthy man before he got married.
Tom was able to answer all of the questions.

Would you mind telling me what\'s happening?
I\'m trying to get in touch with her sister.
I\'ve been a ski instructor for three years.
I\'ve been learning a lot about them lately.
That\'s something I\'ve always wanted to do.
That\'s the guy I saw steal Mary\'s handbag.
I hope you don\'t mind that I let myself in.
I hope you\'ll pay more attention next time.
She doesn\'t have many friends in this town.
Could you tell me how to get to the station?
